Service Areas

Professional access control and door hardware services throughout Central California

Central California Coverage

Based in Hollister, we provide comprehensive access control and commercial door hardware services throughout the Monterey Bay area, Central Coast, and surrounding regions. Our local presence ensures responsive service while our vendor relationships provide enterprise-level capabilities.

Request Service Quote Emergency Contact

Primary Service Area

San Benito County

  • Hollister - Our home base, same-day service available
  • San Juan Bautista, Tres Pinos, Paicines
  • Complete coverage for commercial and institutional projects

Monterey County

  • Monterey - Full service area with regular project work
  • Salinas - Agricultural and commercial hub, frequent service calls
  • Carmel - Hospitality and commercial projects
  • Marina, Seaside, Pacific Grove, Pebble Beach
  • King City, Greenfield, Soledad

Santa Cruz County

  • Santa Cruz - University and commercial projects
  • Watsonville - Agricultural and commercial facilities
  • Scotts Valley, Capitola, Aptos
  • Boulder Creek, Ben Lomond, Felton

Extended Service Area

South Bay (San Jose Metro)

Available for larger commercial projects

  • San Jose, Santa Clara, Campbell
  • Los Gatos, Saratoga, Monte Sereno
  • Milpitas, Fremont, Newark

Central Coast

Full service for commercial and hospitality projects

  • San Luis Obispo - College and commercial projects
  • Paso Robles - Wine industry and hospitality
  • Morro Bay, Pismo Beach, Arroyo Grande
  • Cambria, Cayucos, Atascadero

Santa Clara County

  • Gilroy - Agricultural and commercial facilities
  • Morgan Hill - Growing commercial market
  • San Martin, Coyote

Response Times

Same-Day Service

  • Hollister and immediate surrounding areas
  • Emergency service calls for critical system failures
  • Consultation appointments for urgent projects

Next-Day Service

  • Monterey, Salinas, Santa Cruz, Watsonville
  • Routine service calls and system maintenance
  • Project consultations and estimates

48-Hour Service

  • Extended service areas including San Jose Metro
  • Large project planning and installation scheduling
  • Specialized system installations requiring coordination

Project Types by Region

Monterey Bay - Tourism & Hospitality

  • Hotels and resorts requiring sophisticated access control
  • Restaurants and entertainment venues
  • Conference centers and event facilities

Salinas Valley - Agriculture & Industrial

  • Processing facilities and cold storage
  • Corporate offices and administrative buildings
  • Distribution centers and logistics facilities

Santa Cruz - Educational & Technology

  • University and college facilities
  • Tech company offices and research facilities
  • Student housing and campus buildings

San Jose Metro - Commercial & Technology

  • Corporate campuses and office buildings
  • Technology companies and research facilities
  • Medical and professional buildings

Emergency Service

24/7 Emergency Contact

For critical system failures affecting building security

Emergency Line: (831) 555-0100

Priority Response Areas:

  • Hollister: 1-hour response
  • Monterey/Salinas/Santa Cruz: 2-hour response
  • Extended areas: 4-hour response

Emergency Services Include:

  • Access control system failures
  • Electronic lock malfunctions
  • Exit device problems affecting egress
  • Master key system emergencies
